name: pomelo-client-hx
description: This is a client designed for many game server based on pomelo-family protocol, like pomelo(node.js), pinus(typescript), nano(golang), pitaya(golang) etc.
releasenote: This is a client designed for many game server based on pomelo-family protocol, like pomelo(node.js), pinus(typescript), nano(golang), pitaya(golang) etc.
